title: Ian Liu
text:
About
My name is Yingzheng Liu, or Ian Liu. I’m currently a Graduate Research Assistant at the University of Virginia, and a Lecturer at Trinity University.


Education

PhD(In Progress) in Computer Science, University of Virginia
M.S. in Industrial & Systems Engineering, State University of New York, Binghamton
B.S. in Supply Chain Managment, Arizona State University
B.S. in Computer Information Systems, Arizona State University



Research Fields

Complex systems and systems science
Machine learning and data science for public health



Computer Skills

R, Python, Quarto & R Markdown, \(\LaTeX\), web design and implementation, major database management languages, and Office Suites.



Contact

yliu2 [at] trinity [dot] edu
yl4dt [at] virginia [dot] edu

title: More About Me
text: I have a 3-year old, a happy family, and a pick-up truck. I consider my life pretty complete.

title: Ian Liu
